That crazy night finally came to an end.%K%P
Night gave way to day and Yukari and I sat eating\nbreakfast.%K%P
\dOkay Akira, time to eat! Aaah!\d%K%P
Now, you might think she was trying to get me to\nopen my mouth so she could feed me.%K%P
But actually, she wanted me to feed her.%K%P
\dCome on! Feed me!\d%K%P
\dFine, sheesh.\d%K%P
\dMmm! Oh yes, this is what I call finding fortune\namidst disaster!\d%K%P
\dOh nooo! I got some rice on my cheek! Kiss it off\nfor me!\d%K%P
\dOh come on, you did that on purpose.\d%K%P
\dWho, me? How could I when I'm in a state like\nthis?\d%K%P
I gave another look at the 'state' she was in.%K%P
\dYou sure look wrapped up tight.\d%K%P
Her whole body was bound with ropes.%K%P
\dHonestly, I can't believe she would treat me, your\nsweet wife, in this manner.\d%K%P
\dBut I've got to admit, the situation may have its\nadvantages!\d%K%P
After the ruckus last night, Kaede said she had to\ntake certain measures to feel comfortable with\nleaving the two of us together.%K%P
\dStill, what's up with these ropes? It's like\nthey're made with Jinriki. I can't even budge.\d%K%P
\dThat'd be Kaede's guardian power.\d%K%P
I did feel bad that she'd been tied up all night.\nTrying to untie her, I'd even tried cutting the\nropes, but nothing had worked.%K%P
\dSo this is the power of a reformed Tatarigami,\nhuh?\d%K%P
\dIt's exactly what you're hoping to accomplish. She\nused to be a Tatarigami like you, but now she's a\nnormal Goddess.\d%K%P
\dI guess I'll be better off learning from her... I\nhate to admit it, and it's absolutely humiliating,\nbut...\d%K%P
\dYou really consider her a rival, huh...\d%K%P
\dAre you kidding? She stole your virginity from me!\nI'll never forgive her for that. I just can't!\d%K%P
As her emotions rose, so too did the black haze of\nher Tatari.%K%P
\dYukari, you're oozing black again.\d%K%P
\dOh jeez. Sorry about that. I'm going to need you\nto help me, Akira.\d%K%P
\dGive me a nice, big, lovey-dovey hug to save me.\d%K%P
\dAre you sure it has to be a hug...?\d%K%P
I took hold of her hand just to see.%K%P
As I did, the Tatari faded away.%K%P
\dSee? This works just as well.\d%K%P
\dWhat? But I still haven't even gotten a nice hug\nand kiss!\d%K%P
\dCome on Tatari, put up a fight!\d%K%P
\dYou do realize that is the exact opposite of what\nyou're here for, right?\d%K%P
\dBut... But...!\d%K%P
\dFine, sheesh. This will have to do, then.\d%K%P
I put a hand on her head.%K%P
\dAre you going to pat me on the head and show me\nyour true love?\d%K%P
\dI wouldn't read into it quite that much, but yeah,\nsure.\d%K%P
I gave her a nice, soft pat on the head.%K%P
Her silky smooth hair felt good in my fingers.%K%P
\dMy oh my... This is wonderful...\d%K%P
\dAhhh, true bliss! The merits only a wife can\nenjoy.\d%K%P
\dYes. Aaah yes, I can imagine nothing better than\nthis...\d%K%P
Not too long after that Kaede and Shion showed up,\nand Yukari was freed of her bindings.%K%P
\dThere you are. Free as can be. Lucky you.\d%K%P
\dYou monster...\d%K%P
\dNo kidding, huh? Kaede has no chill. Are you\nreally that worried about Aki?\d%K%P
\dWell, what do you think would have happened if I\nhad let them be?\d%K%P
\dHe'd have been...violated?\d%K%P
\dWhat? No! We would have just had some vigorous\nexercise.\d%K%P
\dSee? I was right. We can't leave this lewd\ncreature alone with him.\d%K%P
\dHey, who you calling lewd?\d%K%P
\dNow Akira, just let me make sure. You're not going\nto send her away, are you?\d%K%P
\dNo, I'm not. Sorry, Kaede.\d%K%P
If I cast Yukari out, there would be nowhere for\nher to go.%K%P
True, she did have a way of stirring up trouble,\nbut if I kicked her out things would definitely be\nmuch worse.%K%P
\dOh, my sweet Akira!\d%K%P
\dHey! Jeez, relax already.\d%K%P
The way she liked to latch on to me was really\nwearing me out.%K%P
She might be a Goddess, but she was also a\nbeautiful girl living under my roof. That kind of\nthing can make a man's mind run wild.%K%P
\dSee that? Now that is love! The beautiful love\nthat binds Akira and me, his lovely wife!\d%K%P
\dYes, yes. We've had quite enough of that. Now step\naway.\d%K%P
\dI. WILL. NOT!\d%K%P
\dThe world would crumble if I did!\d%K%P
\dYou mean because of your Tatari?\d%K%P
\dOh, no, I didn't mean...\d%K%P
\dHehehe, I would never try and destroy this\nbeautiful world that you exist in!\d%K%P
She was still latched on to me while she spoke, and\nshowed no sign of letting go.%K%P
Kaede and Shion tried to wrench her off, but gave\nup after not too long.%K%P
\dYou shouldn't go taking advantage of how kind\nAkira is.\d%K%P
\dWell, Aki here picked me up out of my troubles\ntoo, so I can't really act all holier-than-thou\nabout it.\d%K%P
\dIs that so...\d%K%P
\dYeah. So you see, I can't just go treating you\nbetter than everyone else, Yukari. I plan on\ntreating everyone here as equals.\d%K%P
I was the sort of person who offered a hand to help\nanyone in need.%K%P
I've heard it runs in the family. My father was the\nsame. And his father, and his father before him on\nand on through the generations.%K%P
\dAnd since we all love you Akira, we don't intend\nto force you to change your mind.\d%K%P
\dBut I cannot just allow all this to pass. Who\nknows what this self-proclaimed 'wife' of yours\nmight try to pull?\d%K%P
\dWhat are you going to do, then?\d%K%P
\dIf you aren't going to kick her out, Shion and I\nwill just have to move in, too.\d%K%P
\dYour better half and your mistress will make sure\nthat 'wife' of yours doesn't get out of hand.\d%K%P
\dBut if you're both here us newlyweds won't be able\nto...you know...!\d%K%P
\dThat is precisely why we're staying. Got it?\d%K%P
\dI don't get it, I don't even want to get it...\d%K%P
\dWell it's going to happen, so even if you can't\naccept it, you'd better at least acknowledge it.\d%K%P
And that was that. Things were settled.%K%P
Just as I was about to pose my own thoughts, Kaede\nbeat me to the punch.%K%P
\dIf it's all right with you, I mean. This would be\nfor your own good...\d%K%P
\dYeah, sure. But could I just say a word or two\nabout a couple of things, though?\d%K%P
\dYou mean like that whole 'better half' part?\d%K%P
\dAh...\d%K%P
\dYeah! You run your mouth about everyone else, but\nthen you go ahead and proclaim yourself his 'better\nhalf!'\d%K%P
\dB-But...you're the one so insistent on calling\nyourself his wife, I just needed to put myself in\nthe picture too.\d%K%P
\dI guess I did the same thing calling myself his\nmistress.\d%K%P
\dOn second thought, I suppose that was rather rash\nof me. You know, calling myself that without asking\nfirst...\d%K%P
\dDid it bother you...Akira?\d%K%P
\dOf course it did. Now go on Akira, send them both\naway. Let's have some alone time and build\nourselves a cozy love nest!\d%K%P
\dI told you already, I'm going to treat you all the\nsame.\d%K%P
\dBut, you know... I won't object to just a hug or\nsomething now and again.\d%K%P
\dI've got permission to embrace you, then?!\nYippee!\d%K%P
\dWait, does that mean we'll have our moments too?\d%K%P
\dIt wouldn't be fair if only Yukari could, right?\d%K%P
\dOf course, you don't have to if you don't want to,\nShion.\d%K%P
\dI want to! Bring it on!\d%K%P
\dYou're cool with this too, right Kaede?\d%K%P
\dI-I'm... Well...\d%K%P
\dAs long as it were in private, then...\d%K%P
\dThen what? Come on, spell it out for us!\d%K%P
\dI could never... I can't say...\d%K%P
\dSo you'd do the unspeakable?\d%K%P
\dAll three of us get a chance? Let's get right to\nit! I'll dazzle you with the brilliance of my\nlove!\d%K%P
\dWould you all just calm down?!\d%K%P
I know I shouldn't have yelled, but it wasn't even\nnoon yet.%K%P
You'd think Goddesses would have a little more\nself-control.%K%P
A guy like me needed time to take it all in.%K%P
